entry.def: A bonsai is a tree or shrub that has been kept very small by growing it in a little pot and cutting it in a special way.
Bonsai is the art of growing very small shrubs and trees.

means.word_mean: 1. a dwarfed ornamental tree or shrub grown in a tray or shallow pot
